instruction: Describe the steps to making French toast.
output: To make French toast, start by whisking together 2 eggs, ½ cup of milk, 2 tablespoons of maple syrup, and a pinch of ground cinnamon in a shallow bowl. Dip 4 slices of bread into the mixture, coating them evenly on both sides. Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in a skillet over medium-high heat. Add the coated slices of bread, and cook them until golden brown. Serve the French toast hot with syrup, powdered sugar, and a sprinkle of cinnamon.
